articles.title: Aquaculture Industry: New AI-powered technology by DNV set to transform compliance
articles.author: system
articles.summary: DNV introduced a new AI-powered fish farm technology. This technology is designed to provide assurance and risk management for fish farms.

articles.title: L'ART DU LAVAGE — The Art of Washing
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Haier Philippines introduced its new washing machine line at the 'L'ART DU LAVAGE' event. The launch highlighted three models: the HW140-BD14387GNU1 with Direct Drive motor and AI wash, the HW120-BPD14367S8U1 with BLDC motor, and the HS120-BR1BU featuring Double Drive technology. The event showcased the technology, design, and fabric care solutions of the new Haier washing machines.

articles.title: Alation says new query feature offers 30% accuracy boost, helping enterprises turn data catalogs into problem solvers
articles.author: Sean Michael Kerner
articles.summary: Alation has announced its latest AI capabilities, including an enhanced data query feature called 'Chat with Your Data.' This new feature aims to improve answer accuracy by up to 30%, addressing the demand for unified platforms that democratize data access while maintaining precision for business-critical decisions.

articles.title: Shroomsicles rebrands
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Benni Pops, a mushroom-infused novelties startup, has rebranded and updated its packaging and formulation. This change reflects an evolution of the company's product offerings.

articles.title: The Campbell's Co., Pabst Brewing Co. launch collaboration
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Campbell's launched two new Chunky soups. These soups feature Pabst Blue Ribbon flavors.

articles.title: Maverick Rival: What We Know
articles.summary: Toyota has confirmed its entry into the compact pickup truck segment with a new, unibody truck, designed to compete with the Ford Maverick and Hyundai Santa Cruz. This new Toyota truck will feature a hybrid powertrain, unibody construction, and target a similar towing capacity of 4,000 pounds, with an estimated price point of around $30,000 and an anticipated on-sale date in the Fall of 2027.

articles.title: Walmart Has a $300 Cordless Vacuum on Sale for $79, and Shoppers Say It Makes 'Quick Work' of Pet Hair
articles.author: Jeff Turbett
articles.summary: Moosoo's Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner is now available at Walmart for $79, a 73% discount. The vacuum features 28kPa suction, a 48-minute runtime, and a 1.3-liter dust bin. Shoppers are praising its performance, quietness, and versatility as a lightweight and powerful cleaning solution.

articles.title: Alation says new query feature offers 30% accuracy boost, helping enterprises turn data catalogs into problem solvers
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Alation, a data intelligence platform vendor, has announced its latest set of AI capabilities, including an enhanced data query capability called 'Chat with Your Data,' which aims to improve answer accuracy by up to 30%. This new feature reflects the demand for unified platforms that democratize data access while maintaining precision for business-critical decisions.

articles.title: Iowa DOT pushing bus safety ahead of new school year
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers the WeAreIowa app. This app allows users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones.

articles.title: STL.News Expands Digital Marketing Services
articles.author: Editor In Chief
articles.summary: STL.News has expanded its digital services, offering tools to boost online visibility. The company provides guest posting, business directory listings via STL.Directory, press release distribution, and personal/professional profile publishing. These services are designed to enhance SEO, build brand authority, and increase digital exposure for businesses.

articles.title: How home-grown fashion retailer cuts costs, speeds up overseas growth with grant-supported e-commerce solution
articles.summary: SaturdayClub adopted a new e-commerce platform that significantly reduced the time to enter new markets from six months to just one day. This platform enabled the company to automate website localization, offer local payment options, and scale server capacity, leading to a 38% growth in Malaysia and overall expansion from six to 23 markets. The streamlined operations allow SaturdayClub to explore AI for personalized customer recommendations.

articles.title: Shining at SIGN CHINA 2024: Another Perfect Encounter with Advertising Display Equipment
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: M SERIES modular trade show displays are designed for companies looking to make a big impact at trade shows. The system stands out from the competition, with an innovative design.

articles.title: AgiBot launches robot sales on JD.com
articles.author: Shenzhen Daily
articles.summary: AgiBot, a Shanghai-based company, has made its full product lineup of robotic domestic help available on JD.com. This includes models such as Expedition A2, Lingxi X2, Genie G1, OmniHand, robotic dog D1, and JueChen C5. The move signals a commercial adoption trend in China's humanoid robotics market.

articles.title: MEET THE MAKERS: PEI family turns school project into businesses
articles.author: Laura Churchill Duke
articles.summary: Island Elite Botanicals launched Glow Girl Body Shimmer, made with five all-natural ingredients. Desiree Cable also started Rad Wicks n' Wax, a candle company known for its fun sayings and wood booster wicks. Island Elite Botanicals is also designing a new display for a new product option for their Sundays at the Downtown Charlottetown Farmers' Market.

articles.title: This Hands-Free Mop Is The ‘Easiest And Most Effective Mop I've Ever Used' And It's 20% Off Today
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Customer reviews highlight the features and effectiveness of the "JOY MOOP." Users praise its ease of use, cleaning ability, absorbent pads, and thoughtful design, including a squeezing and drying feature. The mop's design ensures correct usage, and its pad remains relatively clean even after mopping dirty floors due to the bucket's effective rinsing mechanism.

articles.title: Hurry! This Top-Rated Robot Vacuum Is Shockingly 70% Off
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: The article highlights a robot vacuum cleaner currently on sale at Amazon, praising its ability to handle pet hair and various floor types. It also introduces a Labigo electric spin scrubber, a Dyson V8 cordless stick vacuum, and a Bissell Little Green carpet cleaner, among other cleaning products, detailing their features and positive customer reviews from Amazon. The Tineco Breeze wet-dry vacuum boasts upgraded features that let the device self-clean through centrifugal force.

articles.title: A Grandfather's Stories, A Family's Legacy: Billy Skunk Brand Launches Worldwide
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Billy Skunk launched its official online store. The store offers storybooks and merchandise, including apparel and home goods.

articles.title: Bath Depot Makes a Splash in Winnipeg with First-Ever Store in Manitoba
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Bath Depot officially opens in Winnipeg, marking the start of home renovation services in the area.

articles.title: KDDI Launches Service to Design Offices with AI, Robotics
articles.summary: KDDI Corp. launched a new service on Tuesday designed to operate offices, factories, warehouses, stores, and stadiums equipped with AI and robots. The Japanese telecom company targets clients mainly in Japan and Southeast Asia and aims to generate 80 billion yen in revenue from the new service in fiscal 2028.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Gets Triple Discount Before iPhone 17 Release
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a 'triple discount' on its new Galaxy Z Fold 7. This promotion is aimed at maintaining market share in anticipation of Apple's iPhone 17 release.

articles.title: How New Customer Support Technology Can Help Game Developers Get a Head Start
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Modern support platforms are offering new services, including AI-driven support bots that understand gamers' queries, smart ticketing systems that automatically sort and route issues, and in-game support widgets for seamless player assistance. SupportYourApp developed custom software, like Quidget or QCRM, to help manage queues.

articles.title: Stop Chasing AI Labels—Start Demanding Proof
articles.author: Rebecca Isquith
articles.summary: Division-D's AI tool, Neuro, is designed to optimize CTV inventory planning by using real-time signals and data for dynamic decision-making in marketing campaigns. This allows marketers to target previously overlooked audiences and inventory by updating campaign models without user intervention, ultimately improving campaign performance through rapid feedback loops.

articles.title: Back-to-school fun with clay art
articles.summary: KENS 5 introduced the KENS 5 app. The app allows users to stream KENS 5 content on their phones.

articles.title: Texas Tech positions primed for youthful impact
articles.summary: KAGS has made its streaming service accessible on mobile devices through the introduction of the KAGS app.

articles.title: It's Official! Yemi Alade Launches Yem Beauty With Debut Lipstick 'Nairobi'
articles.author: Bella Naija.com
articles.summary: Yemi Alade, the Afrobeats queen, launched her new makeup brand, Yem Beauty, with its first product drop: a lipstick and lip pencil called Nairobi. Nairobi is described as a bold, fiery red shade. The launch was accompanied by a crimson-saturated promotional shoot.

articles.title: Amazon cuts price of 'amazing' Kärcher window vacuum
articles.author: Eve Wagstaff
articles.summary: Kärcher's WV2 Plus N handheld window vacuum cleaner, designed for streak-free cleaning of glass, tiles, and mirrors, is currently available at a reduced price on Amazon. The cordless device weighs less than 1kg, operates for 35 minutes on a full charge, and includes two nozzles, a spray bottle with wiper, a microfibre cloth, and window cleaner concentrate.

articles.title: Save £75 on cute Ninja Crispi that's 'brilliant for smaller kitchens' in limited time deal
articles.summary: Ninja's Crispi air fryer is available on Amazon with a 42% discount. The Crispi is a compact appliance designed for portability and easy storage, offering the power of a full-sized air fryer.

articles.title: Google Photos' Elusive Tinder-Like Feature Pops Up For More Users
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google is testing a Tinder-style swiping feature. This feature is appearing for some users.

articles.title: Bath Depot Makes a Splash in Winnipeg with First-Ever Store in Manitoba
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Bath Depot has opened its first store in Manitoba, located in Winnipeg. This marks the beginning of a new era of home renovation in the region as the company expands its retail presence.

articles.title: 10 Pixels in, the purpose of a Google-made smartphone remains the same
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Google introduced the Pixel line of smartphones, starting with the Pixel and Pixel XL featuring computational photography and free Google Photos backups. Later models introduced features like Night Sight, Call Screen, Motion Sense, 5G support, and the custom Tensor chip enabling AI features like Magic Eraser. The company also released the Pixel Fold, its first foldable phone, and is planning the Pixel 10.

articles.title: Innovation for Cool Earth Forum第12回年次総会 (ICEF2025) 10月8日ー9日、東京にて開催: 画像一覧（2）
articles.summary: Outsourcing Group launched a new brand called BREXA. BREXA aims to remove barriers to employment and career development. This initiative provides new possibilities.

articles.title: Innovation for Cool Earth Forum第12回年次総会 (ICEF2025) 10月8日ー9日、東京にて開催: 画像一覧（1）
articles.summary: Outsourcing Group has launched a new brand called "BREXA" to eliminate barriers in employment and career formation, and to provide new possibilities.

articles.title: Innovation for Cool Earth Forum第12回年次総会 (ICEF2025) 10月8日ー9日、東京にて開催: 画像一覧（3）
articles.summary: Outsourcing Group has launched a new brand called BREXA. BREXA aims to eliminate barriers to employment and career development. BREXA offers new possibilities in the job market.

articles.title: A Wedding Season Skincare Essential
articles.author: Madeline Diamond
articles.summary: Pedestrian Project launched a balm made with a blend of mango butter, candelilla wax, and African shea butter designed to hydrate and soften skin. The balm is applied using a stick applicator and it helps with dry skin and cracked heels.

articles.title: This 'super efficient' vacuum is a no. 1 bestseller on Amazon Canada — and it's 66% off right now
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: MQDXE introduced a Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner featuring powerful suction, a 55-minute runtime, and an anti-tangle brush. It's currently available on Amazon Canada at a discounted price of $170. The vacuum includes HEPA filters, an LED flex head, and additional tools for cleaning tight spaces.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Grok Imagine promises ‘Superhuman Imagination Powers,' expands AI image and video creation to Android users
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: xAI, led by Elon Musk, has launched Grok Imagine, an AI platform that generates images and videos from text prompts or uploaded photos. Initially on iOS, Grok Imagine now offers temporary free access to Android users, allowing wider experimentation with AI-driven content creation. The platform includes features like text-to-image generation, image-to-video transformation, and multiple creative modes.

articles.title: "Insanely cheap": Olive Garden fans say this $30 secret soup hack is the deal of a lifetime
articles.author: Susan Lamarca
articles.summary: Olive Garden offers a catering option where customers can purchase their popular soups by the gallon, dubbed the 'soup bucket,' for around $30. This allows customers to feed approximately twelve people and include breadsticks for an additional cost. The catering option is available through online ordering and has become popular on social media platforms like TikTok.

articles.title: Score $150 in savings on the Dyson V8 before Labor Day weekend
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the V8 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner at a discounted price. The vacuum features a Motorbar cleaner head, cordless operation, HEPA filtration, and includes multiple accessories for versatile cleaning.

articles.title: 'Best mixer EVER!' Save 59% off the KitchenAid 9-Speed Hand Mixer with this exclusive code
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: KitchenAid is promoting its 9-Speed Digital Hand Mixer, highlighting a 59% discount on QVC with code WELCOME30, bringing the price down to $55. The mixer features nine speeds, Flex Edge beaters, and comes with attachments for various kitchen tasks beyond baking, such as milk frothing and meat shredding.

articles.title: 3i G10+ robot vacuum and mop combo deal: $349.99
articles.author: Tabitha Britt
articles.summary: The 3i G10+ robot vacuum and mop combo is available for $349.99 at Amazon, representing a 22% discount from its original price of $449.99.  This self-emptying vacuum can hold up to 60 days of dirt and dust.

articles.title: Nvidia says it's evaluating a 'variety of products' after report of new AI chip for China
articles.author: Annie Palmer
articles.summary: Nvidia is evaluating various products and developing a new AI chip specifically for the Chinese market. This new chip is intended to be more advanced than Nvidia's existing offerings. Nvidia secured a deal with the U.S. government last week to resume selling products.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2: Cleaner, Cozier, and Still Wallet-Friendly
articles.author: Alfredo Robelo
articles.summary: FuturLab is releasing PowerWash Simulator 2 in late 2025 on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5. The sequel introduces gameplay refinements like a redesigned soap system, new tools, a dirt highlighter, and two-player split-screen co-op, while maintaining the original's consumer-friendly price.

articles.title: NVIDIA Unveils Content Writer Feature for Creators: Transforming Virtual Assistants into Powerful Writing Tools This title highlights the transformation of NVIDIA's virtual assistant into a creative t
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NVIDIA launched 'Content Writer,' a new AI-powered feature for its virtual assistant, designed to assist with brainstorming, outlining, drafting, and refining various content types. It leverages NVIDIA's GPUs and AI algorithms to enhance content creation productivity, quality, and SEO optimization. A recent NVIDIA GeForce RTX or NVIDIA RTX professional graphics card is recommended for optimal performance.

articles.title: Find Your New Favorite Fragrance With These Beloved Perfume Sampler Sets
articles.author: Kristen Adaway
articles.summary: Fragrance brands like Le Labo and Armani offer perfume sampler or discovery sets containing mini versions of their best-selling scents. These sets allow customers to experience how a perfume smells and how well it meshes with their body chemistry before purchasing a full-size bottle.

articles.title: Amazon gives you a big reason to ditch your Ring doorbell and try something better
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 40% discount on the Ring Video Doorbell, pricing it at £59.99. The latest model, launched last year, features easy DIY installation, full HD video recording, Colour Night Vision, and person/package alerts. This Ring doorbell can also connect to Echo Show devices.

articles.title: New AI Product Photography Service by iklipse Revolutionizes E-commerce Visuals
articles.summary: iklipse has launched an AI product photography service designed for e-commerce brands. This service replaces traditional photoshoots with AI-powered virtual product photography, offering studio-quality images and AI-generated videos. The service aims to provide a cost-effective and faster solution for creating marketing visuals, with savings of up to 90% compared to traditional methods.

articles.title: Girlfriend.ai Unveils the Most Advanced AI Girlfriend Platform Yet
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: Girlfriend.ai has launched its next-generation AI companion platform, designed around emotional presence and realism. The company is also preparing to release Boyfriend.ai, which is designed for users seeking emotionally intelligent and proactive experience with a male AI companion.

articles.title: Adobe taps AI to teach Acrobat new tricks
articles.author: Ina Fried
articles.summary: Adobe launched Acrobat Studio, a subscription service that utilizes generative AI to allow users to query multiple documents at once. The service, priced at $29.95/month for businesses and $25/month for individuals, combines documents into "PDF Spaces" and automatically organizes and summarizes data, supporting PDF, Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and web pages.

articles.title: PHȲND to Deliver the Future of Big-Screen Gaming on Samsung Gaming Hub--No Console, No Subscription Required
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: PHȲND is launching its free, ad-supported cloud gaming platform on millions of Samsung Smart TVs via the Samsung Gaming Hub. The platform offers instant access to a curated library of games without requiring consoles, downloads, or subscriptions.  It will initially launch in beta in the U.S. later in 2025, with a global rollout planned for 2026.

articles.title: America's Best Unveils Major Brand Transformation: VML Relaunches Eye Care Retailer's Identity with the Powerful Message "Every Eye Deserves Better"
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: National Vision Holdings, Inc.National Vision Holdings, Inc
articles.summary: America's Best, a brand of National Vision Holdings, Inc., is launching a new brand identity, including a logo, brand platform with the slogan "Every Eye Deserves Better", and visual design system. The transformation aims to reinforce America's Best's accessibility to high-quality eye care and stylish frames. The launch incorporates film, social media, and website updates.

articles.title: FCNT Arrows N Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: FCNT announced the Arrows N smartphone in Q4 2022. This 5G-ready phone features a 6.24-inch display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, and a dual-camera system with a 50.3MP main sensor. The smartphone is powered by a 4600 mAh battery and runs on Android 12.

articles.title: Why Smart Marketers Are Using AI for Precision, Not Guesswork?
articles.summary: HubSpot offers an AI Content Assistant for drafting blog intros and email headers. Levi's tested AI-generated visuals to promote inclusivity in their campaigns. Nykaa utilizes AI to tailor product recommendations based on first-party data, leading to a reported 30% increase in repeat purchases.

articles.title: Roborock Launches at Chewy, Offering Smart Cleaning Solutions to Pet Parents
articles.summary: Roborock, a robot vacuum brand, has made its robot vacuums and mops available at Chewy. These vacuums are designed for pet owners and their messes. Pet parents can now explore a wide selection of Roborock's robotic vacuums at Chewy.

articles.title: How AI is redefining luxury lifestyle management in India?
articles.summary: RedBeryl has launched India's first AI-powered luxury concierge platform, designed to deliver hyper-personalized experiences for HNIs/UHNIs in areas like travel, dining, and wellness. Built on Club Concierge's expertise, the platform uses AI as the primary interface, providing instant, intuitive, and culturally sensitive service, while also anonymizing data to meet global privacy standards.

articles.title: AI Agents Are Taking Over: Who Will Hold Them To Account?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: LambdaTest developed a novel testing approach. This approach will help customers deploy new AI agents confidently.

articles.title: Celebrating Its 18th Anniversary, Cellular World Launches Megastore in Canggu and Numerous Programs
articles.author: Shira Ade
articles.summary: Cellular World opened a new megastore in Canggu on August 19, 2025, and launched the "Cellular World 18 Xperience" program. This program, running from August 2025 to March 2026, includes gadget auctions, flash sales, community content workshops, and wellness activities, all as part of Cellular World's 18th-anniversary celebration.

articles.title: Roborock Launches at Chewy, Offering Smart Cleaning Solutions to Pet Parents
articles.summary: Roborock launched its robot vacuums and mops on Chewy, offering exclusive deals on models like the Q8 Max, Q10 X5, QV 35A, Qrevo Curv S5X0, and F25. These products are designed for pet owners and feature powerful suction and intelligent navigation, with specific models offering features like DuoRoller Brush System, high suction power, and anti-tangle technology.

articles.title: Roborock Launches at Chewy, Offering Smart Cleaning Solutions to Pet Parents
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Roborock launched its robotic vacuums and mops on Chewy, offering exclusive deals on models like Q8 Max, Q10 X5, QV 35A, Qrevo Curv S5X0, and F25. This partnership brings Roborock's smart cleaning solutions to Chewy's community of pet parents.

articles.title: Roborock Launches at Chewy, Offering Smart Cleaning Solutions to Pet Parents
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Roborock launched robotic vacuums and mops at a discounted rate for Chewy customers. This promotion is a celebration of the product launch. Roborock is a global leader in smart home robotics.

articles.title: Continuing Bodega Coverage Cont. Super Mart opens on 14th Street
articles.author: Prince
articles.summary: Mini Market has opened a new location at 14th and Randolph, next to Little Coco's. This marks the launch of the new Mini Market service in that area.

articles.title: Samsung Makes Play for Ad-Supported Cloud Gaming With PHȲND Partnership
articles.author: Saleah Blancaflor
articles.summary: PHȲND and Samsung are partnering to launch PHȲND, a free, ad-supported cloud gaming service, on Samsung Smart TVs. This partnership will give Samsung Smart TV users access to a curated library of popular games without consoles, downloads, or subscriptions. PHȲND will first debut in the United States later this year and will be publicly available in beta mode.

articles.title: New PXM Manifesto Demonstrates Urgency of Leading in the Age of Agentic AI
articles.summary: Salsify has launched "The PXM AI Manifesto," a guide for digital commerce leaders navigating the age of agentic commerce. The manifesto outlines principles for Product Experience Management AI impact, focusing on AI as a copilot to enhance human capabilities. It identifies the shift to "Bricks & Clicks & Agents," emphasizing the importance of serving AI agents as a new audience.

articles.title: Nvidia Unveils GeForce Now Blackwell Update: Introducing DLSS 4 and Enhanced Features
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nvidia is enhancing GeForce Now with the Blackwell architecture, providing access to RTX 5080 hardware. This upgrade enables streaming at 5K resolution and 120 frames per second and introduces DLSS 4, improving frame generation, image quality, and ray tracing. The GeForce Now update brings improvements in streaming quality, low latency mode, and adaptive streaming, expanding game library, and supports a wider range of devices.

articles.title: New PXM Manifesto Demonstrates Urgency of Leading in the Age of Agentic AI
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Salsify released 'The PXM AI Manifesto,' a guide for digital commerce leaders, offering strategies for navigating AI-driven changes in online search and shopping. The manifesto addresses both generative and agentic AI and their impact on product discovery and description.

articles.title: Salsify
articles.summary: Salsify has released "The PXM AI Manifesto," a guide for digital commerce leaders navigating the age of agentic AI. The manifesto emphasizes the importance of leveraging AI to enhance human capabilities in product experience management and outlines five core principles for PXM AI impact. It stresses that brands should invest in PXM to make their product data the AI source of truth.

articles.title: 50 Products That Know Just What To Do When You Don't
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article introduces an array of new cleaning products and devices. Platinum Powerwash Dish Spray, a powerful cleaner, is presented as a dishwasher alternative. Bissell's Little Green upholstery cleaner is highlighted for its stain-removal capabilities. An air fryer from Instant Pot, with rotisserie, enables oil-free fried foods, while Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop vacuums and mops simultaneously, retaining 90% of the dirt.

articles.title: LG ThinQ ON Heading For Europe: IFA 2025 Demo Teased
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: LG is set to showcase its home appliance smart home solution at IFA. This suggests an introduction or promotion of a new product or service within the smart home technology sector.

articles.title: Harmonic Amplifies Video Streaming and Broadcast Monetization with VOS360 Ad Enhancements
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Harmonic is enhancing its VOS®360 Ad SaaS solution with AI-powered contextual ad triggering for in-stream ad formats. The enhancements enable programmatic advertising for linear broadcasters and include SDKs for video players, streamlining the advertising workflow and opening new revenue opportunities. The solution integrates with Google Ad Manager and Magnite SpringServe.

articles.title: Harmonic Amplifies Video Streaming and Broadcast Monetization with VOS360 Ad Enhancements
articles.author: Harmonic Inc
articles.summary: Harmonic's VOS 360 Ad SaaS solution now features AI-powered contextual ad triggering and advanced programmatic advertising. The enhancements streamline advertising workflows and offer new monetization opportunities for broadcasters.

articles.title: DXC and Boomi Forge Strategic Partnership to Fast-Track Modernization and Adoption of Agentic AI
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: DXC and Boomi are collaborating to establish a new Boomi Center of Excellence (COE). This COE will function as an innovation hub, assisting customers in unifying AI agents and preparing for agentic AI at scale.

articles.title: HyperAd secures $1 million to fix the ad creative bottleneck
articles.author: CTech
articles.summary: HyperAd launched an AI-powered platform that analyzes ad accounts and generates high-performing creative variations in one click. The platform helps marketers scale winning campaigns faster by shortening the ad creative cycle. The product connects to advertisers' accounts, analyzes live and historical results, and pinpoints changes using AI.

articles.title: I Tried Powdered Body Wash — & I'm Never Going Back To Shower Gel
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: LOoPHA, known for its body washes, has launched a new Hand + Body Powder Wash in three core scents. The powder-to-gel formulation aims to provide a unique cleansing experience. The product utilizes sodium carboxymethyl starch for lathering and spray-dried technology to enhance the fragrance when mixed with water.

articles.title: New platform selling off-the-shelf designs hopes to fix 'broken' branding industry
articles.author: Rob Alderson
articles.summary: Brands Like These (BLT), a platform created by Lyon & Lyon, has launched to sell off-the-shelf brands, providing a marketplace for design projects and unused commercial routes. BLT offers designers the opportunity to sell unpublished brand concepts and entrepreneurs curated agency-standard brand kits, ready to launch, starting with six brands including Uvie wash-on sunscreen bar, Fabrica haircare and hotel brand Cove.

articles.title: 21 Products Reviewers Say They Used From College On
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of products available on Amazon, including items like a shower curtain with pockets, blackout curtains, foam earplugs, and a memory foam seat cushion. These products are marketed towards college students and individuals seeking practical and convenient solutions for everyday needs, highlighting their functionality and convenience.

articles.title: Mschf to corporate America: Don't sue us, pay us
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Mschf is launching a creative consultancy called Applied Mschf. This consultancy will offer services such as marketing, industrial design, digital design, and architecture to between 5 and 10 brands a year. Mschf is restructuring its business entirely to support this new project.

articles.title: Samsung's latest robot vacuum can clean and monitor your home at the same time
articles.author: Camilla Sharman
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Bespoke AI Jet Bot Steam Ultra, a robot vacuum cleaner with AI Object Recognition and steam sanitization. It includes a security camera and incorporates Samsung Knox security features. The product will be showcased at IFA 2025 and is expected to be pricier than its predecessor, the Bespoke AI Jet Bot Combo.

articles.title: LG Electronics will introduce 25 new products customized for Europe at the same time. It is tailored..
articles.author: Lee Deok-Ju
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching 25 new products, including refrigerators and washing machines, at IFA 2025, designed for the European market. These products emphasize energy efficiency and are tailored to European lifestyles with design modifications and new app-based services such as self-check mode and LG Comfort Kit, The new products recorded the highest energy efficiency, far exceeding the European Energy Efficiency Grade A standard.

articles.title: 7 Best New Bath & Body Works Items Hitting Shelves This Month — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Groth
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is introducing several new fall-themed products, including the Farmhouse Pumpkin & Spice 3-Wick Candle ($26.95), White Barn Pumpkin Vine Nightlight Wallflowers Fragrance Plug, Sweet Mum Blossom Gentle & Clean Foaming Hand Soap ($8.95), White Barn White Pumpkin Fragrance Booster ($19.95 or two for $30), Autumn Drive Body Wash ($14.95), Pumpkin Cupcake PocketBac Hand Sanitizer ($1.95 or six for $10), and Whipped Honey & Vanilla Ultimate Hydration Body Cream ($16.95).

articles.title: Xiaomi unveils REDMI 15 with Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 silicon, 7000mAh battery in India
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched a new product or service on Tuesday, August 19th, marking the company's 15th anniversary.

articles.title: You won't believe how long the battery life is on this mega cheap phone
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Poco has launched the Poco M7 smartphone, featuring a 7000mAh battery and a 6.9-inch FHD+ display with a 144Hz refresh rate. The phone is powered by the Snapdragon 685 chip and Xiaomi's HyperOS 2, and it includes a 50MP dual camera setup. The Poco M7 is available for order starting at £129 directly from Xiaomi and £119 on Amazon.

articles.title: Strive Launches New Hydration Soda Line
articles.author: EZ Newswire
articles.summary: New healthier soda products are being unveiled at Newtopia Now in San Diego on August 19, 2025. This launch aims to redefine the healthier soda category.

articles.title: HEINZ Launches Irresistible New Mayonnaise-Style Sauces, Bringing Flavour to Every Bite
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: HEINZ launched new HEINZ Mayonnaise-Style Sauces in Canada, expanding its condiment options. The new lineup includes Smoky Bacon, Garlic Parmesan, Mango Habanero and Pickle flavors. These sauces are now available nationwide at major retailers across Canada.

articles.title: Lidl to sell a cordless vacuum cleaner that's £100 cheaper than on Bosch website in just DAYS
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Bosch Readyy'y cordless vacuum cleaner is launching in Lidl stores on August 24th for £99.99, which is £100 cheaper than on the Bosch website. The series two model is suitable for quick cleaning, can be used as upright or handheld, and features a floor brush suitable for all floor types.

articles.title: Lidl to sell a cordless vacuum cleaner that's £100 cheaper than on Bosch website in just DAYS
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lidl is offering the Bosch Readyy'y cordless vacuum cleaner for £99.99, which is £100 cheaper than the price on the Bosch website. This series two model can be used as an upright or handheld vacuum and is suitable for all types of flooring and quick cleaning jobs, with a 40-minute run time.

articles.title: This ‘powerful' Salter blender is over £20 off and ‘easy to clean'
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Salter is offering the Kuro NutriPro 1000 Multi-Purpose Blender for £42.99, reduced from £69.99. The blender features a one-liter blending jug, locking lid, and stainless-steel blade, suitable for smoothies, shakes, and crushing ice. Customer reviews indicate it's easy to use and clean, making smooth smoothies, though some find it loud.

articles.title: BLU G44+ Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: BLU announced the BLU G44+ smartphone in the first quarter of 2025. The BLU G44+ features a 6.8-inch display, a 13MP rear camera, an 8MP front camera, 4GB RAM, 64GB internal storage and is powered by Unisoc SC9863A Octa-core processor and runs on Android 14 operating system.

articles.title: Full Steam Ahead to a Spotless Home: Flexible and Cordless Steam Cleaning by Tineco
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco is launching the FLOOR ONE S7 Stretch Steam, a new product designed to make floor cleaning simple, efficient, and hygienic. The product aims to tackle challenges like dried-on milk spills and mud stains.

articles.title: 42 Superior Products You'll Try Once And Love So Much That You'll Never Go Back
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream containing aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, available in four shades. E.l.f. launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara that uses lightweight tubing technology to wrap around lashes.

articles.title: How MLB is powering first-party data collaborations with Adobe
articles.author: Chris Kelly
articles.summary: Adobe is expanding its Real-Time Customer Data Platform (CDP) Collaboration with new tools and capabilities. These features are designed to help brands connect and collaborate with other brands. MLB has been piloting the offering alongside brands like The Coca-Cola Company. The new tools include bi-directional connections between Real-Time CDP and Collaboration, audience index scoring, and support for new first-party match keys.

articles.title: Mixed cat litter brand ZuttoNyan -- a lifelong companion for pets -- to enter Japanese market  Aug. 19, 2025 09:00
articles.summary: ZuttoNyan, a new pet care brand, has launched two new hybrid cat litter product lines: Tofu Hybrid Cat Litter and Cassava Hybrid Cat Litter. These litters combine natural ingredients with advanced technology and are designed for quick absorption, strong deodorizing capabilities, minimal dust, and non-stick performance, while also being flushable for convenience.

articles.title: LG PRESENTS NEW SPACE- AND ENERGY-EFFICIENT REFRIGERATOR LINEUP AT IFA 2025  Aug. 19, 2025 09:00
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing its new Fit & Max refrigerator lineup designed for the European market at IFA 2025. The lineup includes french door and bottom-freezer models, emphasizing energy efficiency, space-saving design, and smart features like AI Fresh and AI Saving Mode. These refrigerators incorporate features like Zero Clearance Hinge, adjustable shelving, and optimized insulation to cater to European kitchens and consumer preferences.

articles.title: Tesla prices new model Y L with eye on luring Chinese families
articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.summary: Tesla has priced its new six-seat Model Y SUV starting at 339,000 yuan ($72,800) to compete with Li Auto's L8 in the Chinese market. Deliveries of this new Model Y variant are expected to begin in September.

articles.title: Don't just build, learn to sell: Lessons for India's next gen innovators
articles.summary: Rizween Aziz is developing a convertible smartphone prototype aimed at solving limitations of existing devices by seamlessly adapting across different use cases. He created a working model 12 years ago and emphasizes the importance of intellectual property in protecting and scaling innovative ideas. The product has not been taken to market yet.

articles.title: Unbelievable Samsung deal gets you the Galaxy S25 for £499
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung is offering the Galaxy S25 at a discounted price of £499 by combining two offers: an automatic £100 discount and a £200 discount for trading in any Android phone. The offer is available for both the Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus models, providing savings on either version.

articles.title: Step Into Tomorrow: LG's 2025 TVs redefine home entertainment
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its 2025 home entertainment lineup, featuring the OLED evo, QNED, and NanoCell TVs. The OLED evo offers enhanced brightness and gaming features, QNED provides a high-performance LCD alternative, and NanoCell delivers rich visuals with smart features. Each TV line aims to redefine the viewing experience through AI-driven personalization and wireless capabilities.

articles.title: Digital Car Key Trend: Are Physical Car Keys On Their Way Out?
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor India Limited introduced the Digital Key feature in September 2024 with the ALCAZAR and later in January 2025 with the CRETA Electric, allowing users to unlock and start their cars using smartphones, smartwatches, or NFC cards. One in three Hyundai owners have adopted this feature, with 35% sharing access with family and friends.

articles.title: Honor X7c 5G with 6.8 inch display, 5,200mAh Battery Launched in India at Rs 14,999
articles.author: Asianet Newsable English
articles.summary: Honor has launched the X7c 5G in India. The phone features a 50MP camera, a 5,200mAh battery, and MagicOS 8.0 based on Android 14 and will be available starting August 20th with price tag under Rs 15,000.

articles.title: Smarter Laundry, Smarter Living: Rising Demand for Washer Dryer Combos in India
articles.summary: Samsung is experiencing increased demand for its washer dryer combos in India. These appliances are gaining popularity due to their space-saving design, smart features, and ability to provide hygienic and odor-free laundry, catering to the evolving lifestyles of modern families. The washer dryer guarantees faster drying, increased capacity, and increased convenience.

articles.title: LG Unveils New Energy-Efficient Refrigerators at IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching a new refrigerator lineup at IFA 2025, designed for the European market with top-tier energy efficiency. The lineup includes french door and bottom-freezer models featuring AI-powered features, space-efficient designs, and new technologies like Linear Cooling™ and Door Cooling+™ to maximize food freshness and convenience. The new french door model presents LG's first Thin Door design with both an ice and water dispenser.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE With New Design And ANC Unveiled: Price, Features
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Buds 3 FE earbuds, an affordable version of the Buds 3 lineup, with a price of $149 in the USA and availability starting September 5, 2025. The Galaxy Buds 3 FE supports Galaxy AI and active noise cancellation and provides up to 30 hours of playback with ANC off.

articles.title: 新款岚图梦想家谍照曝光_手机网易网
articles.author: 大象新闻
articles.summary: Lantu is developing a new Dreamer model featuring an 800V platform and 5C supercharging technology. The updated Dreamer will offer battery options of 43.2 kWh, 62.5 kWh, and 63 kWh, achieving a maximum WLTC pure electric range of 300 km.

articles.title: Next-gen Xbox consoles to feature AI neural rendering and cross-platform gaming
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing the next-generation Xbox console with AI-centric hardware and a unified platform strategy, integrating AI through neural rendering and custom silicon developed with AMD. The upcoming Xbox Ally X handheld device will preview AI-enhanced gaming before the next console's anticipated debut around 2027.

articles.title: Tesla launches Model YL with 750km range and roomy cabin
articles.summary: Tesla launched the Model YL, a larger version of the Model Y, in China for ¥339,000 (approximately $47,000). The Model YL features increased space, enhanced features, and improved range per charge, boasting a 751km range and a larger battery pack. The new model has extended dimensions and offers up to 2,539 liters of storage space.

articles.title: One in Three Hyundai Customers Enrol for Using Digital Key Over Traditional Key
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor India Limited (HMIL) launched the Digital Key feature in September 2024 with the Hyundai ALCAZAR and later in January 2025 with the Hyundai CRETA Electric. This feature allows users to lock, unlock, and start their cars using compatible smartphones, smartwatches, or NFC cards, and enables key sharing with family and friends.

articles.title: [브레이크뉴스] 농심, ‘와시비새우깡' 출시 2주만 180만봉 판매 돌파..먹태깡보다 높다
articles.author: 최애리 기자
articles.summary: Nongshim launched 'Wasabi Saeukkang' which achieved 1.8 million in sales within two weeks. Actor Kang Yoo-seok has been selected as the brand ambassador and digital advertisement will be released. Leveraging the brand color, the company plans to collaborate with popular brands among the MZ generation.

articles.title: Google Updates Android Navigation Bar with Samsung-Styled Button Layout: An In-Depth Teardown Analysis
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Google's recent Android updates, rolling out as of August 19, 2025, have introduced a significant change to the navigation bar, a shift towards a button layout strikingly similar to Samsung devices. This change includes swapping the Back and Recents buttons and subtle changes to button icons and animations aligning more closely with Samsung's One UI aesthetic. The latest Android system APKs reveals Google is utilizing resource overlays to modify the existing navigation bar layout.

articles.title: Tesla Unveils Y-Model in China: Expanding Market Control and Influence
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Tesla has launched a new six-seat variant of the Model Y, named the YL Model, in China priced at 339,000 yuan. Deliveries are scheduled to begin in September, marking Tesla's ongoing efforts to expand market control in China through localized production and strategic pricing adjustments, including features tailored for the Chinese market.

articles.title: You can delete sent text messages on Android now - here's how
articles.author: Artie Beaty
articles.summary: Google Messages is launching a new feature that allows Android users to delete sent text messages. This update, which has been rolling out slowly, is now available to most Android devices using Google Messages as their texting platform, offering an undo option for sent messages.

articles.title: Japan Welcomes ZuttoNyan Cat Litter Brand
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ZuttoNyan launched Tofu Hybrid Cat Litter and Cassava Hybrid Cat Litter in 2025. These litters are designed to offer quick absorption, strong deodorizing capabilities, minimal dust, and non-stick performance and are flushable.

articles.title: 7 Essential Prompt Libraries to Revolutionize Your Workflow Today
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Several platforms, including FlowGPT, PromptBase, AIPRM, UsePotion, and Lexica, have introduced new products and services focused on AI prompt engineering and management. These platforms offer features ranging from community-driven prompt sharing to premium prompt marketplaces, ChatGPT integration, and team collaboration tools, catering to diverse user needs and pricing models.

articles.title: PageSection: Multilingual Web Content Tool
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: PageSection's AI Page Translator facilitates the translation and editing of HTML web pages directly within the browser using AI-powered translation. Users can edit the translated content and generate live preview links.

articles.title: 44 TikTok-Beloved Products You'll Enjoy Using Too Much
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights several new product launches, including Dr. Teal's "Hawaiian Bliss" Epsom salt, Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, and Lottabody's Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Additionally, it introduces McCormick's Potato Topping Seasoning and Lumify Eye Drops, plus Olay Super Serum Body Wash and E.l.f's Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, offering consumers a range of options for beauty, personal care, and household needs.

articles.title: Tesla starts taking orders for its new Model Y L in China from 339,000 yuan
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Tesla has begun accepting orders in China for its new Model Y L.

articles.title: Introducing Miutine, the new irreverent, fragrance by Miu Miu
articles.author: Miu Miu Beauty
articles.summary: Miu Miu has unveiled Miutine, a new feminine fragrance designed to capture the essence of the Miu Miu woman. The fragrance features a classic chypre signature with a fruity gourmet twist and is presented in a toffee-toned matelassé flacon.

articles.title: ‘Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion' Switch 2 Preview: A Giant Leap
articles.author: Ollie Barder
articles.summary: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion will be released on September 5 for Switch 2, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam. The game features an open-world setup and high-speed Femto-fuelled boost. It is a sequel to Daemon X Machina and includes player upgrades called Fusion, and part and weapon development. The game will be released with online elements via Unreal Engine.

articles.title: Mystore Launches 'MystoreNEXT' - A Unified SuperApp Ecosystem for Brands, SMEs, and Enterprises on the ONDC Network
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Mystore has launched MystoreNEXT, a next-generation commerce platform designed for brands, SMEs, and enterprises. This platform offers an integrated, all-in-one solution for launching and scaling D2C, B2B, and B2B2C commerce, natively integrated with the ONDC Network. MystoreNEXT includes features like branded storefronts, integrated logistics, AI-powered tools, and omnichannel capabilities.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 review: Best 5G mobile under ₹35,000?
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: OnePlus recently launched the Nord 5 in India, a mid-range smartphone priced under Rs. 35,000. It features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, a 6,800mAh battery, a 50MP main camera, and a matte-gloss finish, available in three colors: Marble Sands, Phantom Grey, and Dry Ice. The OnePlus Nord 5 has 6.83-inch AMOLED display with a variable refresh rate of up to 144Hz.

articles.title: NDL harps on youth empowerment
articles.author: Anthony
articles.summary: Nigeria Distilleries Limited (NDL) announced the 2025 Lord's Achievers Award (LAA), marking its seventh edition. The 2025 awards will introduce four new categories: Media & Journalism, Sports, Content Creation, and Film & Entertainment, expanding the recognition of achievers across various sectors.

articles.title: Normal Clit & G Spot Toy Plum review: Orgasms guaranteed
articles.author: Laura Roscioli
articles.summary: Normal has launched a new product called Plum, a shower-friendly vibrator designed for both internal and external stimulation. The product features seven vibration modes and air intensities, is made from body-safe silicone, and is priced at $130 (early bird). Testers found Plum effective in delivering intense sensations and orgasms.

articles.title: Samsung unleashes its biggest ever Neo QLED TV with a five-figure asking fee that's actually competitive
articles.author: Carrie Marshall
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the QN90F, its largest Neo QLED TV to date, boasting a 115-inch display with glare-free technology and AI-powered upscaling. Priced at $26,999, it targets the growing market for large-screen TVs, offering high brightness for daytime viewing.

articles.title: Geely adds a feature almost every new car in Australia already has
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: The Geely EX5, initially lacking smartphone mirroring, is now receiving this feature, marking an update to the car's capabilities.

articles.title: Samsung unveils affordable earbud with key AI features
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled a new wireless vacuum cleaner on Tuesday.

articles.title: Mixed cat litter brand ZuttoNyan -- a lifelong companion for pets -- to enter Japanese market
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ZuttoNyan is launching Tofu Hybrid Cat Litter and Cassava Hybrid Cat Litter in Japan. These litters combine natural ingredients with advanced technology to offer quick absorption, strong deodorizing capabilities, minimal dust, and non-stick performance. The launch is part of ZuttoNyan's commitment to providing holistic care for pets.

articles.title: Mixed cat litter brand ZuttoNyan -- a lifelong companion for pets -- to enter Japanese market
articles.summary: ZuttoNyan is launching a new hybrid cat litter brand in Japan, featuring Tofu and Cassava Hybrid Cat Litters designed for optimal pet care. LG Electronics is introducing a new energy-efficient refrigerator lineup for the European market, featuring french door and bottom-freezer models with AI-powered features and space-efficient designs.

articles.title: LG PRESENTS NEW SPACE- AND ENERGY-EFFICIENT REFRIGERATOR LINEUP AT IFA 2025
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching a new refrigerator lineup, the Fit & Max series, designed for the European market at IFA 2025. The new refrigerators emphasize energy efficiency, exceeding EU's 'A' energy rating, space-saving design with features like Zero Clearance Hinge and Thin Door design with an ice and water dispenser. The lineup includes french door and bottom-freezer models incorporating AI-powered features and optimized storage solutions.

articles.title: Mixed cat litter brand ZuttoNyan -- a lifelong companion for pets -- to enter Japanese market
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: In 2025, the hybrid cat litter brand ZuttoNyan will be launched in Japan's pet care market. ZuttoNyan is a new entrant with a brand name with deep meaning.

articles.title: New World Pt Chevalier opens, shoppers snap up Smeg cookware promo
articles.author: Tom Raynel
articles.summary: Foodstuffs North Island opened a new $73 million New World supermarket in Pt Chevalier. The opening included a promotional offer on Smeg cookware.

articles.title: Alkimi launches on Sui, rebrands token to ALKIMI ahead of Kraken listing
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Alkimi, a decentralized ad platform, launched on the Sui Network today. The company also rebranded its token.

articles.title: Sword of the Sea release date on PlayStation 5, PC: All you need to know ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: The video game 'Sword of the Sea' has a release date. System requirements details are available.

articles.title: Redmi 15 5G launched with massive 7,000mAh battery and 144Hz display
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Redmi G was launched. The product features a massive mAh battery and a Hz display.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE launched with slim profile, ANC, and 30-hr battery life
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Buds FE. The new earbuds feature a slim profile, active noise cancellation (ANC), and enhanced battery life.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 review: Best 5G mobile under ₹35,000?
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus recently launched the Nord 5 in India, alongside the Nord CE 5. The new mid-range phone promises more power and longer battery life.

articles.title: LG ThinQ ON Heading For Europe: IFA 2025 Demo Teased
articles.author: Paul Lamkin
articles.summary: LG will launch its AI Home Solution and showcase the ThinQ ON hub at IFA 2025 in Berlin. Furthermore, LG is introducing a new refrigerator lineup, including bottom-freezer and french door models designed for European kitchens, featuring AI-driven compressors and space-saving design elements.

articles.title: ChatGPT Go Vs ChatGPT Plus: Price, Key Features And Everything Compared
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: ChatGPT Go has launched in India. This launch brings focus towards ChatGPT Plus, a pricier version with more features, prompting a comparison between the two plans.

articles.title: BUZZ HPC Partners with Bell Canada to Deliver Advanced Sovereign NVIDIA AI Infrastructure for Canada (BCE Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: BUZZ High Performance Computing, a subsidiary of HIVE Digital Technologies LTD., partners with Bell Canada. The partnership aims to deliver advanced sovereign NVIDIA AI Infrastructure for Canada.

articles.title: We could make Rosie the Robot, but should we?
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon is developing Astro, a robotic companion for homes. Samsung is working on Ballie, a similar product. LG is developing an AI Agent for home use, and Apple is also exploring robotic technologies.

articles.title: Globant Presents Globant Enterprise AI 2.0, Featuring a Marketplace of AI Agents for Industries
articles.author: The Community Post
articles.summary: Globant's Enterprise AI 2.0 has introduced The Station. The Station is a new module providing access to a suite.

articles.title: AMTD IDEA, AMTD Digital, and TGE Propose to Launch Crypto Conversion Program
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: AMTD IDEA Group and AMTD Digital are launching the "AMTD cryptocurrency conversion program."

articles.title: Redmi 15 5G mobile launched: Price in India, specifications, and features
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Redmi 15 5G mobile phone in India. The new smartphone targets the affordable segment and features a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 processor and AI-powered features. It is tailored for gaming and entertainment.

articles.title: Sprouts is opening its first organic grocery store in Nevada's capital
articles.author: Reno Gazette Journal
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market will open its first store in Carson City, Nevada on Friday, Sept. 5. The new store will be located at 3193 Market St., No. 110.

articles.title: ChatGPT Go launched in India: Benefits, features, and how it differs from Plus or Pro plans
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: ChatGPT Go has launched in India. The service offers specific benefits and features differentiating it from Plus or Pro plans.

articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: BUZZ High Performance Computing, a subsidiary of HIVE Digital Technologies LTD., is partnering with Bell Canada. Together they will deliver advanced sovereign NVIDIA AI infrastructure for Canada.

articles.title: Made by Google 2025 Live: Pixel 10, Pixel Watch 4, Gemini News and Android 16
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google is preparing to reveal its newest Pixel phones. The launch promises new features and updates to the existing product line.

articles.title: Next sale slashes �60 shower resistant jacket for 'unpredictable weather' to �22
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Next offers a deal on a convenient waterproof jacket, preparing consumers for autumn.

articles.title: Launch Of Monsta's Latest Trailer Receives Global Support
articles.author: Malaysian National News Agency
articles.summary: Animonsta Studios Sdn Bhd (Monsta) launched the latest trailer for their new animated series. The trailer received global support.

articles.title: SOKANY Unveils the SK-13064 Cordless Smart Floor Washer: Silver Ion Sterilization, Self-Cleaning, and Hot Air ...
articles.author: Get News
org: Yiwu Mingge Electric Appliance Co., Ltd.,
articles.summary: Yiwu Mingge Electric Appliance Co., Ltd., through its brand SOKANY, has launched the SK-13064 Cordless Smart Floor Washer. This 3-in-1 appliance features silver ion sterilization, self-cleaning, and hot air drying for vacuuming, mopping, and washing.

articles.title: Scaling Smarter: Nitin Mahajan's Vision For The Future Of AI-Driven Advertising
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: BrandBooster.ai is an AI-driven performance marketing platform that helps founder-led businesses and scaling brands leverage data and AI-driven ad execution. QuickAds.ai is a high-velocity creative engine that uses generative AI to enable businesses to create high-performing ads for multiple platforms quickly. Both tools are designed to offer efficient and scalable ad solutions, with QuickAds.ai complementing BrandBooster.ai by providing creative generation at scale.

articles.title: Ditch the Mower Because Sunseeker's AI Lawn Care Is Now at Lowe's
articles.author: Chris Ahrens
articles.summary: Sunseeker has partnered with Lowe's to offer its next-generation robotic lawn mowers, including the flagship Sunseeker X7, to more homeowners. The Sunseeker X7 is an AI-driven mower with RTK navigation that customizes mowing patterns and self-charges, controlled via the Sunseeker app. The partnership with Lowe's makes it easier for homeowners to purchase Sunseeker mowers online.
